item.description:
Wingmen and Wingwomen,

We are going to attend a Connecticut Whale hockey game! Bring whoever you want to bring for a good time to socialize and enjoy the game. The doors open at 6p.m. to the Hartford XL Center so we are going to plan on getting there around 6-6:45. We will be meeting up at Koji's for 05:15-05:50 then head to the game. This way we can all sit together as a group.

I plan on pre gaming the whole hour before the game starts and hope you all can join me in doing that :) Everyone that plans on attending....if I don't have your number then send it to me via private message or text me at 860-919-9782 letting me know who you are.

It looks as though getting tickets right at the box office is not going to be hard at all. Here's the link to their website so you all can take a look if you have to: http://www.hartfordwo...

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Text or call John at 860-919-9782. If not then look for the only tall red head guy in the place :)
item.name: Connecticut Whale Hockey Game!
